caption.p: Results of PCoA showing the first two principal coordinates that combined explain 46.26% and 35.48% of the observed variation in bacterial ( a) and fungal ( b) community. The shapes of up triangle and square on the figure legend correspond to the soil layer of 0–15 cm and 15–30 cm, and the colors of red, green, and yellow correspond to the SC, TC, and MC communities, respectively. The ellipsoids corresponds to the differences among plant communities (PerMANOVA test, p < 0.05).
